sentences.sContent: About 1,000 people attended the rally in Hyde Park.
sentences.sCn: 大约有1,000人参加了海德公园的集会。

sentences.sContent: We decided to hold a rally to put pressure on the government.
sentences.sCn: 我们决定举行集会来对政府施压。

sentences.sContent: a mass rally (= large rally ) in support of the pay claim
sentences.sCn: 支持加薪要求的大型集会

synos.tran: 团结；重整；恢复；（网球等）连续对打
团结；集合；恢复健康、力量等

phrases.pCn: 赛前动员会，鼓舞士气的集会

trans.tranOther: a large public meeting, especially one that is held outdoors to support a political idea, protest etc
